title: Police: 7-year-old girl dies after shooting in Salisbury
content:
SALISBURY, NC (WTVD) --
A 7-year-old girl was killed early Sunday morning after a Salisbury home was sprayed with bullets, WSOC reports.
Police said the shooting happened around 4:20 a.m. on Harrel Street.
Officers found a 56-year-old who had been shot in the leg and a child who had died at the scene. The 56-year-old was taken to the hospital.
Police did not identify the victims.
